subject: p15131736
History: Year old woman with history of HTN, CAD, dCHF EF > , Afib, COPD, OSA who presents with CHF exacerbation, UTI, VAP and delirium, had desat on 2L to , worsening pulmonary edema worsening pulmonary edema.
Impression: Previous pulmonary edema has cleared. Severe cardiomegaly and dilatation of the hilar and peripheral pulmonary vasculature have improved. Pleural effusions are small if any. No pneumothorax. Right PIC line ends at the origin of the SVC.
